text: Shesham Screenil is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Venu, starring Devan and Silk Smitha in the lead roles.http://www.thehindu.com/todays- paper/tp-national/tp-kerala/film-director-p-venu-dead/article2050040.ece ==Cast== * Devan * Silk Smitha * Jagathy Sreekumar * Prameela ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Shesham Screenil
